ygData.subject: Re: Chant of Battle and Jonthan's Whistling Warsong
ygData.msgSnippet: I have not noticed anything about my hit percentage going down while juggling, though it definately takes more concentration on my part.  I suppose it s
ygData.messageBody:
I have not noticed anything about my hit percentage going down while
juggling, though it definately takes more concentration on my part. I
suppose it's possible, but I haven't really noticed it.

Juggling DOES cause a much higher incidence of "missed notes" though.

As to the drum's usefulness, I don't know who would say that it is not
useful until level 7. The level five song is amazing with the drum, as I'm
sure you all know.

Jyzan


Kristian Leitzen wrote:

> From: Kristian Leitzen <kleit@...>
>
> A moment brother Jyzan,
> you seem to be one of the most experienced of our brothers here, and i
> would like you expert opinion on something. while juggling songs i
> have noticed that my hit percentage goes down. yes i have tested it
> but have no exact numbers. when i juggle i hit less frequently, when i
> sing one i hit more often. maybe it is due to concentration needed on
> the character's part? any observations are welcome. also some posts
> from yesterday mentioned that they didn't think the drum was usefull
> till level 7. accelerando is level 5 and the drum is extremely
> beneficial to this song. thank you for your time brother.
> Olczyk of Qeynos
> 8th level and loving it
> Tarew Marr
